H0.text: Decomposers are black bears that eat nuts, berries, honey, insects, and fish.

H1.text: Herbivores are animals that, like black bears, eat a diet consisting of nuts, berries, honey, insects, and fish.

H2.text: Black bears are omnivores, eating a diet that includes nuts, berries, honey, insects, and fish.

H3.text: Prey are black bears that eat nuts, berries, honey, insects, and fish.
